net.sf.JRecord.ByteIO

Interface IByteRecordReader

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IByteReader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractByteReader, BaseByteTextReader, ByteTextReader, CsvByteReader, FixedLengthByteReader, FujitsuVbByteReader, MicroFocusByteReader, TextReader, VbByteReader, VbDumpByteReader, VbsByteReader, ZOldBaseByteTextReader

    public interface IByteRecordReader
    Read a series of Byte-Array Records from what ever This is general interface that users can use to some data-store e.g.
    • IBM ZFile on the IBM mainframe
    • Google File Store
    Usage 
         IByteRecordReader myByteReader =...
     AbstractLineReader reader = JRecordInterface1.COBOL
         .newIOBuilder(...)
              ....
         .newReader(myByteReader);
    Author:
    Bruce Martin

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the file
      byte[] read()
      Read one line from the input file as an array of bytes
